alert.note: Alert for McCook; Minnehaha (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 10:48AM MDT until May 04 at 11:15AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Minnehaha County in southeastern South Dakota... East central McCook County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 1215 PM CDT. * At 1147 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Montrose, or near Lake Vermillion State Recreation Area, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 1144 AM nickel sized hail was reported by a trained spotter in Montrose. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Humboldt around 1205 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Hartford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
